name: Mint Online Marketing
overview:
MINT Online Marketing is an agency based in Cardiff, Wales, UK offering a complete Online Marketing Solution to SME businesses.

We specialise in Search Engine Optimisation, Social Media Marketing and Pay Per Click advertising.

We are focused on offering the best possible Online Marketing Services for small and medium sized enterprises throughout the United Kingdom. Our objective is to offer the necessary service and support to help your business develop whilst ensuring we offer true value for money.

The world of business is dynamic and constantly developing, at MINT Online Marketing, we understand the significance of Online Marketing Services to any business in the twenty first century. We have the in-house capability to enhance the accessibility of your business and advertise your services to a vast audience at the click of a button.
